title: Sudden drop in FPS
body: I am experiencing a lot of sudden FPS drop in game recently especially after the recent HUD update. My FPS in game is sometimes 140 but it drops below 10 suddenly which makes the game feel extremely laggy even when my ping is low. Am I the only one experiencing this weird FPS drop or is everyone getting this problem?

replies.body:
Hi SorakaXHealBot

What do you usually have your FPS set to in "Video" settings in the client?
